channel.title: Animation
channel.description: Im using a delta platform and the animation for combat is realy mesed up. like the monsters glitch everywear and it looks terrable. any help pn this animation problem would be greatly appriciated.

item.title: Animation
item.dc:creator: @Christmas_tree Christmas_tree
item.description:
@Christmas_tree wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:2, topic:478312”]1. DeltaScape isn’t a platform.

  1. You can set a fixed Animation for your N.P.C. in the NPCHandler class of your Server. It’s probably listed under a huge wall of ‘else if’ Conditions.[/quote]

Again, Jack is correct. There is also a bug that will make NPC’s flinch. It’s to do with the rebuilding of the NPC list

Read full topic

item.title: Animation
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

  1. DeltaScape isn’t a platform.

  2. You can set a fixed Animation for your N.P.C. in the NPCHandler class of your Server. It’s probably listed under a huge wall of ‘else if’ Conditions.

Read full topic
